description: Sven Halek authorizes a public statement and coordinated return of disappeared citizens. Groups of returnees appear in central districts, sharing visible scars and powerful testimonies that shock the public and fuel debates about justice and reintegration.

At Sven's urging, returnees present their hidden BCI subroutines and logs before free zone councils, exposing direct evidence of factional abuses and secret orders issued prior to Halden’s death. Councils are split between seeking reconciliation and demanding reckoning.

Oksana convenes an emergency Council session. Internal factions clash over whether to deploy the returnees’ codes to unify the BCI or shut the system down completely, while Sven publicly advocates for openness as the only path toward unity.

A citywide broadcast assembly is held: returnee spokespeople and council delegates debate the BCI’s fate live. The city is deeply divided, with public demonstrations calling either for permanent unity or total rupture.

The returnees publicly trigger a coordinated demonstration of their BCI codes, halting all scoring citywide for several hours. Everyday life is disrupted as citizens confront the true costs and buried dangers of the old system.
